includedAssets.title: Episode 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Drama series about a bustling and glamorous grand hotel in wartime London. Lord Hamilton returns to the hotel just as a scandal threatens to engulf it.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Drama series about a bustling and glamorous hotel in wartime London. Lord Hamilton returns to the hotel just as a scandal threatens to engulf it.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Drama series about a bustling and glamorous grand hotel in wartime London. Lord Hamilton returns to the hotel just as a scandal threatens to engulf it.

includedAssets.title: Episode 2
includedAssets.synopsis: The hotel suffers the aftershocks of change. Lady Hamilton and Garland go to war - but this may be the least of his troubles.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The hotel suffers the aftershocks of change. Lady Hamilton and Garland go to war - but this may be the least of his troubles.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The hotel suffers the aftershocks of change. Lady Hamilton and Garland go to war - but this may be the least of his troubles.

includedAssets.title: Episode 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Following the fall of France, guests flood into the hotel - one of whom catches Lady Hamilton's eye.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Following the fall of France, guests flood into the hotel - one of whom catches Lady Hamilton's eye.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Following the fall of France, guests flood into the hotel - one of whom catches Lady Hamilton's eye.

includedAssets.title: Episode 4
includedAssets.synopsis: Joe is offered the opportunity of a lifetime - but finds himself unexpectedly torn. Meanwhile, Betsey's mother comes for a surprise stay.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Joe is offered the opportunity of a lifetime - but finds himself unexpectedly torn. Meanwhile, Betsey's mother comes for a surprise stay.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Joe is offered the opportunity of a lifetime - but finds himself unexpectedly torn. Meanwhile, Betsey's mother comes for a surprise stay.

includedAssets.title: Episode 5
includedAssets.synopsis: As the Halcyon hosts a society wedding, Emma must step up to oversee it - but there is trouble brewing in the air.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As the Halcyon hosts a society wedding, Emma must step up to oversee it - but there is trouble brewing in the air.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As the Halcyon hosts a society wedding, Emma must step up to oversee it - but there is trouble brewing in the air.

includedAssets.title: Episode 6
includedAssets.synopsis: The Halcyon struggles on as the Blitz rages, with the guests forced into lockdown in the basement.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Halcyon struggles on as the Blitz rages, with the guests forced into lockdown in the basement.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Halcyon struggles on as the Blitz rages, with the guests forced into lockdown in the basement.

includedAssets.title: Episode 7
includedAssets.synopsis: Adil deals with a terrible secret, Emma and Joe edge closer together and the hotel comes under increased pressure from the police.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Adil deals with a terrible secret, Emma and Joe edge closer together and the hotel comes under increased pressure from the police.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Adil deals with a terrible secret, Emma and Joe edge closer together and the hotel comes under increased pressure from the police.

includedAssets.title: Episode 8
includedAssets.synopsis: As the Halcyon celebrates its 50th anniversary, Lucian tries to keep things together as the pressure mounts. Meanwhile, Garland and Lady Hamilton find a cause.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As the Halcyon celebrates its 50th anniversary, Lucian tries to keep things together as the pressure mounts.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As the Halcyon celebrates its 50th anniversary, Lucian tries to keep things together as the pressure mounts. Meanwhile, Garland and Lady Hamilton find a cause.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Olivia Williams, Steven Mackintosh and Kara Tointon star in this eight-part drama series telling the story of a bustling and glamorous grand hotel in London during the Second World War.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Olivia Williams and Kara Tointon star in this drama series telling the story of a bustling and glamorous grand hotel in London during World War Two.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Olivia Williams, Steven Mackintosh and Kara Tointon star in this eight-part drama series telling the story of a bustling and glamorous grand hotel in London during the Second World War.

includedIn.title: The Halcyon
includedIn.synopsis: The story of a bustling and glamorous grand hotel at the centre of London society during the Second World War.
